Pilot rescued from Tasman Bay after ‘ditching’ aircraft in water off Nelson coast https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-unfolding-aviation-incident-at-tasman-bay-near-nelson/BZ4PVY52UJAZPJGKYPAMNPVQAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-unfolding-aviation-incident-at-tasman-bay-near-nelson/BZ4PVY52UJAZPJGKYPAMNPVQAQ/ It's understood a NZDF aircraft and multiple helicopters are involved. Young diver Jade Kahukore-Dixon fatally attacked by shark near Chatham Islands, community in shock https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/diver-attacked-by-shark-in-chatham-islands/4QN5YPFMZBC2FKYSMX653QXH24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/diver-attacked-by-shark-in-chatham-islands/4QN5YPFMZBC2FKYSMX653QXH24/ The victim has been described as 'an amazing boy' who loved fishing and diving. Tue, 19 Nov 2024 05:55:21 +0000 Commercial diver Jade Kahukore-Dixon, 24, was killed by a shark today near the Chatham Islands. He was brought back to Waitangi Wharf before being rushed to hospital.
